function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Increase in human interaction in offline retail spaces leading to higher risk of contagious disease spread","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased online shopping due to the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of physical and human touch in online retailing","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Accelerated adoption of technology in brick-and-mortar and online retailing","category":"Technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Indirect and direct impact of technology implementation on customer satisfaction and shopping experience.","category":"Technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased mobile traffic during covid-19 lockdown","category":"Technology","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Online retailers promoting ar app downloads","category":"Technology","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of tactile input in webshop experience","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on visual and auditory stimuli","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher mobile traffic during covid-19 lockdown","category":"Technology","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of physical inspection and trial opportunities for products online","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perceived risks leading to online shopping abandonment","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of product returns on retailers’ bottom line","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to address the ’forgotten senses’ in online marketing could lead to suboptimal consumer information processing and a lack of differentiation in the cluttered online environment.","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential risk of spreading contagious diseases through direct customer interactions via chatbots on social media platforms.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of virtual conversational agents and avatars in e-commerce may create a false sense of security regarding disease transmission.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased social interaction in online shopping experiences","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglect of social distancing measures in online interaction","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher demand for online shopping leading to increased exposure to contagious diseases","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of sensory input in online shopping preventing customers from getting a complete shopping experience.","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of a warm, human touch social presence during online interactions.","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Webshops not considered pleasant ’places’ to visit, leading to a lack of experiential value online.","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Customers shifting towards online shopping due to covid-19 lockdown","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty around consumer acceptance of technology-based innovations may lead to resistance and hesitancy in adopting new digital solutions.","category":"Technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced sound levels may lead to uncomfortable ambiance","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Psychological reactance leading to anti-social behavior such as increased touching of products.","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Biometric surveillance measures , face recognition, gps tracking creating privacy concerns","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of voice assistants and social robots may facilitate the spread of contagious diseases by allowing interactions without physical contact.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virtual reality and holographic technology may create an illusion of physical presence, leading to reduced adherence to physical distancing measures.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of humanoid service robots in retail environments may lead to increased physical interactions and close contact, contributing to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for human-to-human contact during in-store shopping or pick-up","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced social interaction due to technology-mediated solutions","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on technology for sales and interactions","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shoppers may feel on edge and try to keep a distance from other shoppers and employees.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long queues at the store entrance may increase fear of contamination and negative feelings.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased store crowding can lead to fear of contamination and decreased customer satisfaction.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impacts of covid-19 measures on utilitarian and hedonic shopping value","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fear of contamination causing barriers to visiting stores and using services","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced social interaction due to social distancing measures in shopping stores","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Consumers’ fear of contamination and increased reluctance to get close to other people and potentially contaminated
